KA_Analysis.K1: The candidate will respond to a series of short answer questions related to AI-generated script ideation techniques for world-building, storyline, and character development in a Written Exam.
KA_Analysis.A1: The candidate will perform a practical exercise on analyzing AI output for bias and submit corrective steps in a Practical Exam.
KA_Analysis.K2: The candidate will answer questions on copyright law covering Gen AI usage in a Written Exam.
KA_Analysis.A2: The candidate will utilize NLP techniques and tools to enhance AI-generated story elements in a Practical Exam.
KA_Analysis.K3: The candidate will explain Gen AI tool limitations and solutions in a Written Exam.
KA_Analysis.A3: The candidate will apply ethical considerations in prompt selection and reference usage in a Practical Exam.
KA_Analysis.K4: The candidate will demonstrate awareness and correction of bias in LLMs training data in a Written Exam.
KA_Analysis.A4: The candidate will filter and script-edit Gen-AI output in a Practical Exam.
KA_Analysis.K5: The candidate will discuss best practices to minimize plagiarism risk in a Written Exam.
KA_Analysis.A5: The candidate will use AI-generated text techniques to develop script elements in a Practical Exam.
KA_Analysis.K6: The candidate will describe AI tools for script analysis and market research in a Written Exam.
KA_Analysis.A6: The candidate will apply and adjust prompts in the generative process to improve iterations in a Practical Exam.
KA_Analysis.K7: The candidate will discuss Gen AI and Ethics awareness in a Written Exam.
KA_Analysis.A7: The candidate will identify key terms and themes for input into Gen AI platform in a Practical Exam.
KA_Analysis.K8: The candidate will explain basic NLP techniques and tools relevant to AI Text generation in a Written Exam.
KA_Analysis.A8: The candidate will incorporate unique creative principles into AI-generated story ideas in a Practical Exam.
KA_Analysis.K9: The candidate will describe creative principles and storytelling in AI-generated text prompts in a Written Exam.
KA_Analysis.A9: The candidate will identify copyright risk in Gen-AI production and avoid infringement in a Practical Exam.
KA_Analysis.K10: The candidate will explain basic AI algorithms and models used in script/text generation in a Written Exam.
